item.title: Hegseth to look into 'what went wrong' in Afghanistan and pledges accountability, slams diversity motto
item.description: While speaking to the DoD, Secretary Pete Hegseth promised accountability for Afghanistan events.

item.title: Transgender people sue Trump administration over new passport policy eliminating 'X' gender marker
item.description: A group of transgender individuals is suing the Trump administration over a new policy that eliminates the "X" gender marker on passports.
